articles.title: 'Clown car of a debate': SE Cupp reacts to AZ GOP debate - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN political commentator SE Cupp reacts to a primary debate between GOP candidates for Arizona's gubernatorial election.

articles.title: Discovery of unserved warrant renews family's call for justice for Emmett Till - CNN Video
articles.description: The family of Emmett Till is calling for justice. Nearly 70 years ago, the Black 14-year-old's murder helped spur the civil rights movement in America. His family recently discovered an unserved arrest warrant for his accuser, who is still alive today. They h…

articles.author: Liam Reilly, CNN
articles.title: Group wielding White nationalist flags march along Boston's Freedom Trail on July 4 weekend
articles.description: A large group of people carrying flags and shields marched along downtown Boston's Freedom Trail Saturday, according to the Boston Police Department -- and video footage of the group obtained by CNN shows the flags bearing the symbol of the White nationalist …

articles.author: Jarrod Wardwell, CNN
articles.title: Appeals court sets Richard Glossip's execution date with conviction appeal pending
articles.description: An Oklahoma appeals court has scheduled the execution date for death row inmate Richard Glossip while his defense rushes to mount a legal battle with newly uncovered evidence they say will prove his innocence in a 1997 murder case.

articles.author: Ray Sanchez, CNN
articles.title: The hot-car death of 22-month-old Cooper Harris was heartbreakingly familiar. His father's unusual murder conviction has now been thrown out
articles.description: Those nightmarish hot-car death cases often draw national attention. But they rarely lead to criminal charges from prosecutors who must weigh the intent of grieving parents who insist they simply forgot leaving their child in a hot car.
articles.content:
(CNN)On the final morning of his short life, 22-month-old Cooper Harris was up early, at 5:15, an hour before sunrise in the Atlanta suburb where he lived with his parents.

articles.author: Mick Krever, Phil Black, Kostyantin Gak, and Richard Harlow, CNN
articles.title: Deep in the eastern Ukrainian forest, this group of volunteers waits as Russia's military creeps closer
articles.description: Maxym is waiting. For just over a month, he and his comrades have been sleeping in earthen dugouts, eating from cans warmed over campfires, and following news of the Russian military advancing just kilometers away.

articles.title: Suspect in eastern Kentucky shootout that killed 3 officers was 'a terrorist on a mission,' sheriff says

articles.author: Rachel Ramirez, CNN
articles.title: How the climate crisis is forever changing our national parks
articles.description: When Garrett Dickman drove through Yosemite National Park early this week, he passed through a diverse band of large trees -- conifer, red fir, lodgepole pine -- and noticed a grim pattern: many of the trees were either dead or dying.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: 'Cryptoqueen' Ruja Ignatova added to FBI most-wanted list over OneCoin scheme
articles.description: A German citizen accused of defrauding investors out of $4 billion by selling a fake cryptocurrency called OneCoin has been added to the FBI's list of its ten most-wanted fugitives, US officials said on Thursday.
